   "source": [
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "from smpl import plot\n",
    "from smpl import functions as f\n",
    "import uncertainties.unumpy as unp\n",
    "import uncertainties as un\n",
    "import smpl\n",
    "smpl.__version__\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "\n",
    "data = np.loadtxt('test_linear_data.txt')\n",
    "xdata = data[:,0]\n",
    "xerr = data[:,2]\n",
    "ydata = data[:,1]\n",
    "yerr = data[:,3]\n",
    "x = unp.uarray(xdata,xerr)\n",
    "y = unp.uarray(ydata,yerr)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
